statements: DELETE FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE support_agent = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 100 AND support_agent = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 200 AND customer_name = 'Alice Smith';
DELETE FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 5 OR customer_id = 10;
DELETE FROM email_follow_up WHERE follow_up_id = 3 OR customer_id = 15;
DELETE FROM customer_emails WHERE is_primary_email = FALSE;
DELETE FROM CustomerSupportResponses WHERE response_by = 'John Doe';
